boolean.name: enableEventCreation
boolean.title: Enable event creation
boolean.help: When this configuration is enabled, an event will be associated with planned times, meaning that when time is planned for a user, an event linked to this planned time appears on their calendar.

string.name: eventSubjectGroovyFormula
string.title: Event subject groovy formula
string.help: This formula allows customizing the subject of the event that will be created. For example the formula project.fullName + ' - ' + projectTask.fullName which will display the project name and the task name on which time is planned as the event title.

boolean.name: enablePlanification
boolean.title: Enable planification
boolean.help: If this option is enabled, planification will be available on project and project task views and some auto-generated planning lines will be added when generating via the project template, as well as sprint change on project tasks.
